EmailTemplate.subject: Confirming your call with Live Different
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Live Different We are about seeing change. We are about building hope. We are about embracing a lifestyle of caring for people, not "stuff". We believe that together, we really can make a difference!
Hi {!Lead.FirstName},
Thank you for taking the time to speak with us today. This email serves to confirm your call with Live Different on {!Lead.PPS_Client_Phone_Follow_Up_Day_Date_Time__c}. To make the best use of our time on the call, please take a few minutes to review some additional information about Live Different.
Live Different was established as a Canadian non-profit organization in 2000, and began operating internationally in 2005. From the very beginning we have been passionate about making a difference in the lives of the people we encounter through our youth empowerment presentations, our humanitarian build programs, and our leadership development opportunities.
In addition to an engaging concert-style motivational assembly, Live Different offers supplementary class-room workshops, keynote speakers, as well as youth programs and resources that inspire students to take immediate action to make a positive difference in their world.
Over the past 15 years we have had the opportunity to speak to over 1 million students – in 2200 schools – to build over 350 homes, schools, and other projects, and to mentor over 5,000 students, interns, and volunteers.
Here’s what just a few school Principals had to say about Live Different:
"I'm not sure how the presentation could be improved- it was absolutely amazing! I heard comments like 'That's the best presentation I have seen in my entire teaching career' from a veteran teacher, and students were raving about it for days. It was very worthwhile and inspirational."
Jo'ann Obrien, St James Regional High School
"In my 17 years in education this is the best loved student assembly I have ever been to. Students were literally hugging me in thanks for bringing LIVE DIFFERENT in."
Lorna Cameron, E.W. Pratt High School
"The Live Different presentation was a powerful experience for both staff and students. The message of Kindness was empowering and the connection they made with the audience was phenomenal and students remained actively engaged throughout. Students loved their slide presentation and the live music performed by their band. We look forward to having them back again."
Mary Jacquart, Georges P. Vanier Junior High School
See what our Motivational Presentations look like. (video) https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mGWCT8IS1Oo
Your cost: Live Different has taken significant measures to ensure as many students as possible can be reached with this exciting program. By operating on a donation-based pricing model, it gives all schools the opportunity to partner with us.
This is the character development presentation that students, parents, and teachers will thank you for bringing to your school! You'll capture your students' attention and transform them with a message that matters.
I look forward to speaking with you.
Dave Hamilton Live Different
877-432-4464 ext. 222 dave@livedifferent.com www.livedifferent.com
